This degree weight loss achievable behavioral obesity program . However , 33 % initial weight loss regain within one year little weight loss maintain within three five year . Thus , new strategy improve long-term weight loss maintenance need . One dietary strategy increase self-reported satiation satiety consume low energy density ( ED ) diet . Research show participant serve low-ED meal , total weight food consume change , meal energy intake decrease . Importantly , low-ED meal consume across several day , reduce energy intake continue occur , show degree energy intake compensation . To address gap regard relationship dietary ED weight loss maintenance , propose conduct randomize control trial ( RCT ) examine effect low-ED prescription propose mechanism weight loss maintenance . DOC.criteria: Age 18 70 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 27 45 kg/m2 Report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Individuals report joint problem , prescription medication usage , medical condition could limit exercise require obtain write physician consent participate Report unable walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop Report major psychiatric disease organic brain syndrome .
